compensable_items: ✓ Market value: $1,500,000.00 at valuation date January 15, 2024
✓ Highest and best use: Commercial development (industrial/office) (zoned Employment Commercial (EC))
✓ Valuation date: Earlier of Form 7 (2024-01-15) or plan registration (2024-02-01)
✓ Business losses: $260,000.00 (limited to 6 month reasonable relocation period)
✓ Permanent use impacts (s.18(2)(b)): $85,000.00 (capitalized permanent value loss - Antrim four-part test)
non_compensable_items: ✗ Special purchaser premium excluded: $250,000.00 (Adjacent owner willing to pay $1.75M for assemblage - premium excluded per s.13 OEA)
✗ Goodwill NON-compensable: $150,000.00 (s.18(3) OEA excludes intangible value - owner can rebuild at new location)

analysis_notes: Expropriation compensation analysis under Ontario Expropriations Act
Property: 2550 Industrial Avenue, Mississauga, ON L5T 2K9 (50.0 acres)
- s.13 OEA: Market value at highest and best use
- s.18 OEA: Disturbance damages (but-for test, reasonableness, foreseeability)
- s.18(2)(b): Permanent use impacts (Antrim four-part test)
